languages.text: "Опустошительная буря терпит погибель". {n}Друкари говорит медленно, выбирая слова.{/n} "После смерти архонта Иремерисс наши территории раздирают на части, на воинов нападают в открытую, наемники обращают оружие против кабалитов, а в воздухе носятся слухи о том, что высшие покровители вскоре позволят предать наш шпиль кровавой жатве..."

traits.locale_text: "Опустошительная буря пала под натиском конкурентов". {n}Друкари говорит медленно, выбирая слова.{/n} "С гибели Архонта Иремерисс прошло не так времени, а наши территории уже раздирают соседние кабалы, наемники обращают оружие против хозяев кабала, а в воздухе носятся слухи о том, что высшие покровители вскоре позволят предать наш шпиль кровавой жатве..."
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: "The Reaving Tempest is dying." {n}The Drukhari speaks slowly, carefully choosing his words.{/n} "Since the death of Archon Yremeryss, our territories have been ravaged and our warriors openly attacked, mercenaries have turned their blades against our Kabalites, and the air is rife with rumours that our supreme patrons will soon allow our spire to be consigned to a bloody reaping..."
languages.original_text: "Опустошительная буря терпит погибель". {n}Друкари говорит медленно, выбирая слова.{/n} "После смерти архонта Иремерисс наши территории раздирают на части, на воинов нападают в открытую, наемники обращают оружие против кабалитов, а в воздухе носятся слухи о том, что высшие покровители вскоре позволят предать наш шпиль кровавой жатве..."

traits.locale_text: "The Reaving Tempest is dying." {n}The Drukhari speaks slowly, carefully picking the words.{/n} "After the death of Archon Yremeryss our territories are being ravaged, our warriors are openly assaulted, the mercenaries turn blades against the Kabalites, and the air is rife with rumours about the supreme patrons will soon allow our spire to be consigned to a bloody reaping...."
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

traits.locale_text: "The Reaving Tempest is dying." {n}The Drukhari speaks slowly, carefully choosing his words.{/n} "Since the death of Archon Yremeryss, our territories have been ravaged and our warriors openly attacked, mercenaries have turned their blades against our Kabalites, and the air is rife with rumours that our supreme patrons will soon allow our spire to be consigned to a bloody reaping..."
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: "Der plündernde Sturm stirbt." {n}Der Drukhari spricht langsam, wählt seine Worte mit Bedacht.{/n} "Seit dem Tod von Archontin Yremeryss wird unser Territorium verwüstet, unsere Krieger werden offen angegriffen. Söldner haben ihre Klingen gegen die Mitglieder unserer Kabale gerichtet, und es kursieren unzählige Gerüchte, dass unsere obersten Schutzherren bald eine blutige Ernte in unserem Turm gestatten werden ..."
languages.original_text: "The Reaving Tempest is dying." {n}The Drukhari speaks slowly, carefully choosing his words.{/n} "Since the death of Archon Yremeryss, our territories have been ravaged and our warriors openly attacked, mercenaries have turned their blades against our Kabalites, and the air is rife with rumours that our supreme patrons will soon allow our spire to be consigned to a bloody reaping..."

traits.locale_text: "Der plündernde Sturm stirbt." {n}Der Drukhari spricht langsam, wählt seine Worte mit Bedacht.{/n} "Seit dem Tod von Archontin Yremeryss wird unser Territorium verwüstet, unsere Krieger werden offen angegriffen. Söldner haben ihre Klingen gegen die Mitglieder unserer Kabale gerichtet, und es kursieren unzählige Gerüchte, dass unsere obersten Schutzherren bald eine blutige Ernte in unserem Turm gestatten werden ..."
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: “狂风阴谋团正在消亡。”{n}眼前的黑暗灵族慢慢开了口，小心翼翼地挑选着措辞。{/n}“自从伊芮梅莉斯执政官死后，我们的领土就遭到了蹂躏。我们的战士遭到了公然袭击，所有雇佣兵都把他们的利刃对准了我们的阴谋团。空气之中充斥着谣言，说我们的最高赞助人很快会任由我们的尖塔在血腥的收割中毁于一旦……”
languages.original_text: "The Reaving Tempest is dying." {n}The Drukhari speaks slowly, carefully choosing his words.{/n} "Since the death of Archon Yremeryss, our territories have been ravaged and our warriors openly attacked, mercenaries have turned their blades against our Kabalites, and the air is rife with rumours that our supreme patrons will soon allow our spire to be consigned to a bloody reaping..."

traits.locale_text: “狂风阴谋团正在消亡。”{n}眼前的黑暗灵族慢慢开了口，小心翼翼地挑选着措辞。{/n}“自从伊芮梅莉斯执政官死后，我们的领土就遭到了蹂躏。我们的战士遭到了公然袭击，所有雇佣兵都把他们的利刃对准了我们的阴谋团。空气之中充斥着谣言，说我们的最高赞助人很快会任由我们的尖塔在血腥的收割中毁于一旦……”
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: « La Tempête ravageuse se meurt. » {n}Le Drukhari parle lentement et choisit ses mots avec soin.{/n} « Depuis la mort de l'archonte Yremeryss, nos territoires sont ravagés et nos guerriers ouvertement attaqués, les mercenaires retournent leurs lames contre nos Kabalites. Des rumeurs persistantes condamnent notre tour, abandonnée par nos chefs, à un bain de sang... »
languages.original_text: "The Reaving Tempest is dying." {n}The Drukhari speaks slowly, carefully choosing his words.{/n} "Since the death of Archon Yremeryss, our territories have been ravaged and our warriors openly attacked, mercenaries have turned their blades against our Kabalites, and the air is rife with rumours that our supreme patrons will soon allow our spire to be consigned to a bloody reaping..."

traits.locale_text: « La Tempête ravageuse se meurt. » {n}Le Drukhari parle lentement et choisit ses mots avec soin.{/n} « Depuis la mort de l'archonte Yremeryss, nos territoires sont ravagés et nos guerriers ouvertement attaqués, les mercenaires retournent leurs lames contre nos Kabalites. Des rumeurs persistantes condamnent notre tour, abandonnée par nos chefs, à un bain de sang... »
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: «La Tempestad Asoladora se muere». {n}El Drukhari habla lentamente, eligiendo con cuidado sus palabras.{/n} «Desde la muerte de la Arconte Yremeryss, nuestros territorios han sido asediados y nuestros guerreros atacados abiertamente. Los mercenarios se han vuelto contra nuestros Kabalistas y abundan los rumores de que nuestros patrones supremos pronto permitirán la siega de nuestra torre...».
languages.original_text: "The Reaving Tempest is dying." {n}The Drukhari speaks slowly, carefully choosing his words.{/n} "Since the death of Archon Yremeryss, our territories have been ravaged and our warriors openly attacked, mercenaries have turned their blades against our Kabalites, and the air is rife with rumours that our supreme patrons will soon allow our spire to be consigned to a bloody reaping..."

traits.locale_text: «La Tempestad Asoladora se muere». {n}El Drukhari habla lentamente, eligiendo con cuidado sus palabras.{/n} «Desde la muerte de la Arconte Yremeryss, nuestros territorios han sido asediados y nuestros guerreros atacados abiertamente. Los mercenarios se han vuelto contra nuestros Kabalistas y abundan los rumores de que nuestros patrones supremos pronto permitirán la siega de nuestra torre...».
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: 「リーヴィング・テンペストは死に瀕している」{n}デュカーリは言葉を選びながらゆっくりと慎重に話す。{/n}「アーコン・イレメリスが死んで以来、我々の領土は荒廃し、我々の戦士は公然と攻撃され、傭兵たちはカバライトに剣を向け始めた。どこもうわさだらけだ、後援者たちはすぐに我々の尖塔が血だらけの収穫に追いやられることを認めるだろうと…」
languages.original_text: "The Reaving Tempest is dying." {n}The Drukhari speaks slowly, carefully choosing his words.{/n} "Since the death of Archon Yremeryss, our territories have been ravaged and our warriors openly attacked, mercenaries have turned their blades against our Kabalites, and the air is rife with rumours that our supreme patrons will soon allow our spire to be consigned to a bloody reaping..."

traits.locale_text: 「リーヴィング・テンペストは死に瀕している」{n}デュカーリは言葉を選びながらゆっくりと慎重に話す。{/n}「アーコン・イレメリスが死んで以来、我々の領土は荒廃し、我々の戦士は公然と攻撃され、傭兵たちはカバライトに剣を向け始めた。どこもうわさだらけだ、後援者たちはすぐに我々の尖塔が血だらけの収穫に追いやられることを認めるだろうと…」
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: "Müfteris Kasırga ölüyor." {n}Drukhari, sözcüklerini dikkatle seçerek yavaşça konuşuyor.{/n} "Arkon Yremeryss'in ölümünün ardından sahip olduğumuz bölgeler yağmalanıyor, savaşçılarımız açık saldırılara uğruyor. Paralı askerler, silahlarını Kabalistlerimize karşı kullanmaya başladı. Yüce efendilerimizin, kulelerimizi kanlı bir katliama mahkûm edeceği söylentileri dolanıyor."
languages.original_text: "The Reaving Tempest is dying." {n}The Drukhari speaks slowly, carefully choosing his words.{/n} "Since the death of Archon Yremeryss, our territories have been ravaged and our warriors openly attacked, mercenaries have turned their blades against our Kabalites, and the air is rife with rumours that our supreme patrons will soon allow our spire to be consigned to a bloody reaping..."

traits.locale_text: "Müfteris Kasırga ölüyor." {n}Drukhari sözcüklerini dikkatle seçerek yavaşça konuşuyor.{/n} "Arkon Yremeryss'in ölümünün ardından sahip olduğumuz bölgeler yağmalanıyor ve savaşçılarımız açık saldırılara uğruyor. Paralı askerler silahlarını Kabalistlerimize karşı kullanmaya başladı ve havada, yüce efendilerimizin, kulelerimizi kanlı bir katliama mahkûm edeceğine dair söylentiler dolanıyor."
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari
